code: import React from'react';import{parseColors}from'../../../../../../../../helpers/ParseData';import productsData from'../../../../../../../../products.json';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Colors=_ref=>{let{selectedColors,setSelectedColors}=_ref;const colors=parseColors(productsData.products);const handleColorChange=e=>{const{value,checked}=e.target;setSelectedColors(prevColors=>checked?[...prevColors,value]:prevColors.filter(color=>color!==value));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-title",children:"Colors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"colors",children:colors.map(color=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",className:"color-checkbox",id:color.toLowerCase(),value:color,checked:selectedColors.includes(color),onChange:handleColorChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:color.toLowerCase(),className:"color-name",children:color})]},color))})})]});};export default Colors;
